text: niccayamāka, nām mūsāvai nam'muṭaiya attāṭcikaḷai koṇṭu aṉuppivaittu, "nīr um'muṭaiya camūkattiṉarai iruḷkaḷiliruntu, veḷiyēṟṟip pirakācattiṉ pāl koṇṭu vārum, allāhviṉ aruṭkoṭaikaḷai avarkaḷukku niṉaivūṭṭuvīrāka" eṉṟu kaṭṭaḷaiyiṭṭōm; niccamayāka itil poṟumaiyuṭaiyōr, naṉṟi celuttuvōr ellōrukkum paṭippiṉaikaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉa
